body.name: ALAVIKING Yoga Pants for Women Double Layer High Waisted Yoga Leggings Tummy Control Workout Pants with Pocket Stretchy
features: ❤❤ALAVIKING yoga leggings with pockets for women are made of ultimate stretchy fabric. With specially developed 28% high elastane and unique textile technology, these womens yoga pants exhibit excellent high elasticity. 10 inches waistline can be pulled up to more than 20 inches and swiftly recover their shape. Super high resilience allows you to maintain control during even the most challenging yoga postures and withstands the rigors of daily use.

❤❤Featuring specific carbon finishing fabric, the butter soft micro fiber on both sides make these compression leggings for women feel like your second skin, non-bound feeling, protecting your skin from rubbing hurt while you exercise. You can touch and feel it when you receive our thick gym leggings for women. The carbon finishing fabric efficiently wicks away sweat and moisture, help you to stay dry and comfortable during your camping, cycling or hiking.

❤❤Deepened pockets on both sides, our high waisted leggings for women provide ample space for securely stashing a 6.7 inches cell phone. Triangle reinforcing line at pocket edge prevents it from slipping out,making you more at ease when walking, riding,or running.Specially designed crotch area eliminates the risk of camel toes,non see through,ensuring smooth wearing experience. Reinforced elastic band on top of double layer high waist effectively prevents it from slipping down or rolling up.

❤❤Designed with classic silhouette and neutral color palette like black, navy, purple, blue, grey, pink and red, these workout leggings for women effortlessly complement all kinds of clothing, when you go out for sports, golf, volleyball or tennis. Even when you're going for a casual or more dressed-up look, our seamless leggings for women provide a solid foundation for creating stylish outfits without the hassle of wardrobe dilemmas.

❤❤Notes & Sizes: Our butt lifting leggings for women are designed according to U.S. Standard Size, please choose the most comfortable size by your actual length of waist, hip, and leg. Recommended Sizes: S (waist):21~23 inch, M (waist):23~25 inch, L (waist):25~27 inch, XL (waist):27~29 inch, 2XL (waist):29~31 inch.

productInformation.value: #34,767 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #230 in Women's Yoga Leggings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery soft, comfortable and long, double pockets
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a large - I am 6ft and about 160lbs for reference. They fit perfectly. They are flawless and flattering in all the right spots. Not too tight, not to loose very sleek. They can be worn for athletic wear or daily wear as well. I love the double pockets on both sides. I ordered navy as that is one legging color that I do not have but it will match with a lot of the color tops etc that I do have. They are high waisted as well and that helps as well with tummy control. I cannot wait to buy more pairs in different colors and add to the collection!!!!! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little tight for a medium. Maybe I should have ordered large

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The material that these pants are made with is amazing they are so smooth and feel good on. For reference I'm normally a medium and that's what I bought, I'm 5'6" and 138 and they fit great the length is even good, which is unusual. I love the pockets they are very deep and located just in the right place, not to high as some are. I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for all activities
reviews.reviewText: These leggings are amazing. They're thick not they aren't hot. They allow your skin to breathe. They've got decent sized pockets and they are full length pants, going until your ankles. I tested them today by wearing them during a 3 mile run. They didn't fall and they didn't make me sweat, even while doing a high intensity workout under the setting sun. These are now one of my favorite leggings!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these leggings because I love this shade of pink! Also, I like to buy leggings with pockets so I can stash my phone - especially useful when I am doing yardwork in the summer. These leggings are medium thickness, and I feel like they could be a slightly heavier fabric. That said, they're not sheer. The other "must" that I have in leggings is a high waist, which these leggings have. I ordered my usual size in leggings (XL or XXL) and they fit great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and comfy
reviews.reviewText: My new favorite compression leggings. Super soft and comfortable, true to size. Washed and dried well with no shrinkage, fading, snagging or pilling. Easy to move in them. Perfect for exercise. VERY happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and stretchy leggings by Alaviking with a front center seam
reviews.reviewText: The size 8 black leggings by Alaviking are made in PRC (china). The leggings are made from a 72% polyester and 28% spandex fabric. The fabric has been "brushed" to make it soft to the touch, and as a result, the fabric is a magnet for pet hair. The leggings are very stretchy, and a size 8 fits my normal size 8 frame well. I did have a little sliding on the waistband. The leggings are comfortable for all day wear. The leggings passed my squat test, and the thin material is dense enough to not show what is underneath. I would have preferred the black color on the inside of the waistband, as the pink showed when they slid down.4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Pants, Flattering, Fits as Expected
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these yoga pants in small and they fit as expected. Leggings and yoga pants seem to be very popular these days, and this particular pair is very nice looking.The color is true to the product images: I ordered black, and they are in fact black. As per the description, these have pockets. They're skin tight, by design, but they manage to be flattering as well - perhaps that's the double layer at work, who can say?Overall, I'm very happy with these pants. They're not the cheapest you can buy, but they're well made and a great value for $30. Would buy again and/or recommend.
